name: Unknown Item
title: Unlocking Perks
overview: Perks are initially unlocked in labs. To access the lab you will need to unlock and complete the Unlock Perks lab in Milestones at tier 2 wave 150.

requirements.tier_requirement: Must reach tier 2 wave 150 in Milestones
requirements.lab_requirement: Must complete the "Unlock Perks" lab research
requirements.unlock_chain: This lab unlocks other perk-related labs after completion
